places_with_reviews.name: Shri Sidhbali Baba Dham Mandir, Kotdwara
places_with_reviews.address: QG5Q+6GX, Shri Sidhbali Marg, Kotdwar, Uttarakhand 246149, India

reviews.text: Great experience one of the oldest hanuman temple will surely visit again. Crowded on weekends try to be early. You can also have langar organised here by help of local governing authority of the temple.

Jai Bajrang Bali ki Jai 🙏🙏🙏🙏, Jai shree Ram🙏🙏🙏🙏
Jai Ho Shri Sidhbali Baba ki Jai

The Hanuman idol in this temple is one of the most beautiful idols I have ever seen. The place is neat and clean but at some height. You have to climb stairs to explore the area.

Pleasant Temple Peaceful Location before Mountain Valley Starts!!!
Bhandara(Free Meal) available for all. Sweet is must try, in meal.

Serene environment, divine experience, no long waiting in lines despite a mild crowd. The temple is situated atop a hill and one has to climb a number of stairs to reach there. Holy, divine and beautiful experience (the view and the bhandara is a plus plus)

places_with_reviews.name: Kalagarh Tiger Reserve Safari Booking
places_with_reviews.address: Division, Kotdwar - Lansdowne Rd, Dugadda Range, Uttarakhand 246149, India

reviews.text: This is the other side of Corbett park which is also called Kalagarh. One of the most thrilling safari ride I ever took. I would rate it better than any other safari ride that I have taken on Ramnagar side of Corbett Tiger Reserve. The terrain goes up and down the mountain and many river crossing which made is much thrilling as compared to Ramnagar corbett drive which is usually plain. Animal sighting is hard I would say as compared to Ramnagar side as this side has much dense forest and rugged terrain. Please book through official website only and in advance as there is much less number of safari permits in a day if I compare with Ramnagar side. No food options available inside the park.

This was a wonderful safari! Our tour guide Anil was very educated and knew every bird in the park! We saw multiple different species of flora and fauna. The tours were conveniently set up and I would recommend to anyone looking to get out into Jim Corbette National Park!! If Anil is your guide, your in wonderful hands!!

The sunset view was amazing and we enjoyed it to the fullest amidst cacophony! All around greenery is a big plus here. Surely enjoyable!

Beautiful view with nice weather. You can only take your car up to a poiint before army men stop you. Take your car till you can go as the walk uphill is very exhausting. Once you park your car, you will walk the final mild which is at least a km . The view is spectacular and you can spend time. Be safe a enjoy the sunset !!!
Almost raw jungle nice natural vibe spent night in guesthouse, just amazing

Absolutely amazing place for nature lovers. I was able to see a beautiful group of deers and sambhar deer, wild fox, various species of birds. The elephants are the biggest fear here as they are very moody. Not able to see any tiger, will try again next time.

places_with_reviews.name: St. Joseph's Cathedral Church, Kotdwara
places_with_reviews.address: Bishop House Rd, behind Govt Hospital, Mohabewala Industrial Area, Kotdwar, Uttarakhand 246149, India

reviews.text: We went there on Christmas Day. This church is one of the famous churches of Asia
Beautiful Church. Neat and clean campus. Peaceful atmosphere for prayer and meditation and refreshing the soul.
I have visited many churches but this is really quite unique! A must see even if you are not religious, but just for the very interesting structure, it is worth the visit Kotdwar ♥️

Supposedly, it's the 2nd largest church in Asia. Since we like to explore all kind of places of significance so we decided to visit it on our way from Landsdown to Haridwar. It's certainly a massive structure surrounding by a well maintained garden and lawn. However, church opens at 5pm and one of the staff was very rude to us when we entered in the wrong gate by mistake.

Overall, nothing great to visit.. you should rather visit St. Johans and St. Marrys church both built more than 100 years ago.

One of the best and biggest Church in Asia considered one of the top in top 10 church of Asia. Beautiful Church and visited by many people of all communities. Must visit place if you visit Kotdwar, Uttrakhand.

places_with_reviews.name: Sidhpeeth Sukhro Devi Mandir, Kotdwar

reviews.text:
It is the oldest temple present in Devi road, Kotdwara. The road also took its name from the temple itself. Inside the temple there is the Devi Mata statue and Shivling along with Radhe Krishna bhagwaan.
On the backside there is a banyan tree which is interconnected with a peepal tree also for Shani bhagwan Puja and Hanuman ji Murti also located in the front of The Tree.
This place is easy to commute and you can park your vehicles outside the temple on the other side of the road.
Jai Mata Di
It's not ment for review bcoz these places are divine it's depends on the seeker that what he or she can seek from the place ...
Jai Mata Di..... Give your little time from busy schedule to this peaceful environment of Devi Mandir and tell Devi Mata about what you did today and what will you do tomorrow.

Sacred place with good library and good vibes for students...
Thanks to Mandir Samiti for providing the hall for students
Kotdwar itself is a peaceful place and Sukhro Devi Mandir is one of the most famous place in kotdwar.

places_with_reviews.name: Buddha Park, Kotdwar

reviews.text: One of the good parks located on the way to Sidhabli temple. You can go for a brisk walk there and enjoy open gyms also. Municipal corporations should reestablish this park as it is situated at the perfect place for kids to play and swing there
It is onw of the oldest park of kotdwara and is now popular by the name of buddha park. Best place for kids picnic area and is surrounded by nature.
A statue of Lord Buddha has been established in the park and the park lot of amenities and full of greenfield.
Good location... nice hill view.. but not for couples 😁😁😂
Nice park for morning vibes
